name: Handy Dan's
description:
A bustling city has a lot that goes right... and a lot that goes wrong. Help run Handy Dan's repair shop by coordinating the fleet of repair vehicles around the city to fix the citizens' problems.

Reminders:

The trucks need to have supplies on-hand to finish the job

We have a deal with Tools N' Stuff, so pick up any extra supplies from there

If there's some extra money sitting around, there should be some ways to put it to good use

Hope all goes well out there!              Regards ,
